sentence: 她想为了爱而结婚，而不是为了钱。

sentence: 来两个辣汉堡和一杯大可。

sentence: 要找出适合你的颜色。

sentence: 现在科学可以说明许多神秘的事。

sentence: 你没事吗？

sentence: 如果一件事情好到不像是真的，多半不是真的。

sentence: 甲：「这么热的天，你怎么一点都不嫌热？」乙：「心静自然凉。」

sentence: 他姓陈，名字叫华清。

sentence: 这就是我们生活中常用的两种语调。

sentence: 珍重主人心，酒深情亦深。

sentence: 我不知道。

sentence: 毛主席的那个经典歇后语「和尚打伞，无法无天」
translation: that classic double pun used by Chairman Mao, "A bald monk holding up an umbrella, no (respect for) law and order." (法 (fǎ, “law”) and 髮／发 (fà, “hair”) are homophones in Chinese; 天 (tiān) literally means sky, but it is also short for 天理 (tiānlǐ, “heavenly justice”).)

translation: To those fortunate ones [among us] who read books [is] given the opportunity to go beyond [the limitation of only having access to] the experiences of our own lives.

sentence: 偶与此辈倾谈，便见叫苦不迭。
translation: If by chance you get into intimate conversation with them, they invariably pour out their endless grievances.

sentence: 他们将冲决一切束缚他们的罗网，朝着解放的路上迅跑。
translation: They will smash all the trammels that bind them and rush forward along the road to liberation.

sentence: 这个攻击的形势，简直是急风暴雨，顺之者存，违之者灭。
translation: In force and momentum the attack is tempestuous; those who bow before it survive and those who resist perish.

sentence: 地主的体面威风，扫地以尽。
translation: Every bit of the dignity and prestige built up by the landlords is being swept into the dust.

sentence: 前清地方造丁口册，有正册、另册二种，好人入正册，匪盗等坏人入另册。
translation: In the Qing Dynasty, the household census compiled by the local authorities consisted of a regular register and “the other” register, the former for honest people and the latter for burglars, bandits and similar undesirables.

sentence: 我到各处，常常遇到这种人，这样向我求情：「请省里来的委员作保！」
translation: Visiting various places, I often came across such people who pleaded with me, “Mr. Committeeman from the provincial capital, please be my sponsor!”

sentence: 乡里消息传到城里来，城里的绅士立刻大哗。
translation: When the news from the countryside reached the cities, it caused immediate uproar among the gentry.

sentence: 我初到长沙时，会到各方面的人，听到许多的街谈巷议。
translation: Soon after my arrival in Changsha, I met all sorts of people and picked up a good deal of gossip.

sentence: 很进步的人也只是说：「这是革命过程中应有的事，虽则是糟。」
translation: Even quite progressive people said, “Though terrible, it is inevitable in a revolution.”

sentence: 这是四十年乃至几千年未曾成就过的奇勋。
translation: This is a marvelous feat never before achieved, not just in forty, but in thousands of years.

sentence: 农会权利无上，不许地主说话，把地主的威风扫光。
translation: Supreme in authority, the peasant association allows the landlord no say and sweeps away his prestige.

sentence: 土豪劣绅的小姐少奶奶的牙床上，也可以踏上去滚一滚。
translation: They even loll for a minute or two on the ivory-inlaid beds belonging to the young ladies in the households of the local tyrants and evil gentry.

sentence: 因此，农运一起，匪患告绝。
translation: Thus the evil of banditry has ended with the rise of the peasant movement.

sentence: 外卖来了，我还没起床。我裹着被卧给人开的门儿。
translation: I was still in bed when the food got delivered. I opened the door for them while being wrapped in a quilt.

sentence: 还会说人话吗？
translation: Do you even know how to talk?

sentence: 他处处跟我过不去。
translation: He's always putting me in awkward situations.

sentence: 农民中有富农、中农、贫农三种。
translation: There are three kinds of peasants, the rich, the middle and the poor peasants.

sentence: 性平别等！
大家都说我是好人，但我其实是一个坏人，而且是萌萌眼中的大恶人。
translation: Everyone says I am a good person, but I am actually a bad person; in fact, I am a great villain in the eyes of homophobes.

sentence: 这是什么来的？
translation: What is this?

sentence: 中农呢？他们的态度是游移的。
translation: How about the middle peasants? Theirs is a vacillating attitude.

sentence: 他们锅里有米煮，没有人半夜里敲门来讨账。
translation: They have rice cooking in their pots and no creditors knocking on their doors at midnight.

sentence: 他们和土豪劣绅是死对头，他们毫不迟疑地向土豪劣绅营垒进攻。
translation: They are deadly enemies of the camp of the local tyrants and evil gentry and attack it without the slightest hesitation.

sentence: 贫农，因为最革命，所以他们取得了农会的领导权。
translation: The poor peasants, being the most revolutionary group, have gained the leadership of the peasant associations.

sentence: 他们的革命大方向始终没有错。
translation: They have never been wrong on the general direction of the revolution.

sentence: 农会势盛地方，牌赌禁绝，盗匪潜踪。
translation: Where the peasant association is powerful, gambling has stopped altogether and banditry has vanished.

sentence: 有些地方真个道不拾遗，夜不闭户。
translation: In some places it is literally true that people do not take any articles left by the wayside and that doors are not bolted at night.

sentence: 对于今秋减租，农民正大做宣传，地主们亦在问减租办法。
translation: The peasants are doing extensive propaganda for rent reduction in the coming autumn, and the landlords are asking how the reductions are to be carried out.

sentence: 向为富不仁的地主捐款救济贫民，办合作社，办农民贷款所，或作他用。
translation: The unscrupulous rich landlords are made to contribute for poor relief, for the organization of co-operatives or peasant credit societies, or for other purposes.

sentence: 地主为免祸计，自动地捐款给农会的，亦颇不少。
translation: To avoid trouble, quite a number of landlords make voluntary contributions to the peasant associations.

sentence: 把土豪劣绅戴上一顶纸扎的高帽子，在那帽子上面写上土豪某某或劣绅某某字样。
translation: A tall paper-hat is stuck on the head of one of the local tyrants or evil gentry, bearing the words “Local tyrant so-and-so” or “So-and-so of the evil gentry”.

sentence: 那劣绅不知何日要戴高帽子，每日在家放心不下，坐卧不宁。
translation: Not knowing when he would be crowned, the man was in daily suspense, unable to sit down or sleep at ease.

sentence: 三天之后，我才纳过闷儿来，我的钱让他骗走了。
translation: Three days later, I finally realized: my money was defrauded by him.

sentence: 这道题为什么这么做，我还是纳不过这个闷儿。
translation: I still cannot figure out why this problem is solved this way.

sentence: 这人把我给说得五迷三道儿的。乖乖儿掏钱买了一堆不需要的玩意儿来。
农民们相与议论，谈到都团总，则愤然说：「那班东西么，不作用了！」
translation: Whenever their conversation turns to the heads of the du and the tuan, the peasants say angrily, “That bunch! They are finished!”

sentence: 在农民势力极盛的县，农民协会说话是「飞灵的」。
translation: In counties where the peasant power was very strong, the word of the peasant association worked miracles.

sentence: 这种会议，由县长召集，在县署开。
translation: The council is convened by the magistrate and meets in his office.

sentence: 在这样的会议里，各民众团体的意见影响县长，县长总是唯命是听。
translation: At such council meetings the magistrate is influenced by the views of the public organizations and invariably does their bidding.

sentence: 湖南的司法制度，还是知事兼理司法，承审员助知事审案。
translation: The judicial system in Hunan remains one in which the county magistrate is concurrently in charge of judicial affairs, with an assistant to help him in handling cases.

sentence: 警备队、警察、差役，一概敛迹，不敢下乡敲诈。
translation: The armed guards, the police and the bailiffs all keep out of the way and dare not go near the villages to practice their extortions.

sentence: 于是知事及其僚佐们的荷包，只好空着。
translation: So it is that the purses of the magistrates and their underlings perforce remain empty.

sentence: 港真，这个地方儿好玩儿吗？
translation: Frankly, is this place interesting?

sentence: 你以为这里是什么地界儿，你敢在这里撒野？
translation: Where do you think you are? How dare you act like a madman here?

sentence: 这人怕是要牢底坐穿了。
translation: This person is bound to serve life.

sentence: 我要为他生猴子！
translation: I would like to bear a baby for him!

sentence: 人民的眼睛是雪亮的。
translation: The people's eyes are discerning.

sentence: 他把他家里那种种可笑规矩，看成圣贤的金科玉律。
那谁多前儿回来的？
translation: When did you-know-who come back? (literally: At what time did you-know-who come back?)

sentence: 这都啥前儿了，你咋还没走呢？一会儿赶不上飞机了！
我最近咋这么倒霉？一定是水逆害的！
translation: Why am I so unlucky recently? It must be because of Mercury retrograde!

sentence: 水逆退散！
translation: The bad luck of Mercury retrograde, be gone!

sentence: 这事，因为是农会委员长孙小山倡首，当地的道士们颇恨孙小山。
translation: Because the initiative in this matter was taken by the chairman of the peasant association, Sun Hsiao-shan, he is hated by the local Taoist priests.

sentence: 总而言之，所有一切封建的宗法的思想和制度，都随着农民权力的升涨而动摇。
translation: In a word, the whole feudal-patriarchal system and ideology is tottering with the growth of the peasants' power.

sentence: 农会势盛地方，麻雀、骨牌、纸叶子，一概禁绝。
translation: Where the peasant association is powerful, mahjong, dominoes and card games are completely banned.

sentence: 他受你如此侮辱，怎肯善罢甘休？
translation: As you have insulted him, he won't let you go easily.

sentence: 蚊产卵后两三星期即变为跟头虫，再经两星期此虫即变为蚊。
translation: Two to three weeks after the mosquito lays eggs, they become wrigglers, and after another two weeks, these bugs become mosquitoes.

sentence: 敢情您是瞎猜的！
translation: It turns out you were just guessing at random!

sentence: 那敢情好！
普遍禁止用谷米煮酒熬糖，糟行糖行叫苦不迭。
translation: The use of grain for distilling spirits and making sugar is everywhere prohibited, and the distillers and sugar-refiners are constantly complaining.

sentence: 饶着穿成这样儿还热。得亏我今儿少穿了件儿！
translation: Even though I am wearing like this, I still feel hot. Thanks to that I wear one clothing fewer today!

sentence: 株洲商会冒失地杀了一头牛，农民上街问罪，罚钱而外，放爆竹赔礼。
translation: When the Chamber of Commerce of Zhuzhou rashly slaughtered a cow, the peasants came into town and demanded an explanation, and the chamber, besides paying a fine, had to let off firecrackers by way of apology.

sentence: 有一种「强告化」又叫「流民」者，平素非常之凶，现在亦只得屈服于农会之下。
translation: The “beggar-bullies” or “vagabonds” who used to be extremely aggressive now have no alternative but to submit to the peasant associations.

sentence: 此为沙田马场一周内第二宗堕马事件。
translation: This is the second case within one week of [a rider] falling from their horse at the Sha Tin Racecourse.

sentence: 这里没有誓愿纸，你去律师楼问清楚再来啦！
败则怀恨在心，胜则反攻倒算。
translation: In defeat, malice. In victory, revenge.

sentence: 我现在最头痛的，是不能平心静气地和父母谈话。
translation: The biggest headache for me now is that I can’t talk to my parents calmly.

sentence: 小明系我个老死。
translation: Siu Ming is a close friend of mine.

sentence: 生仔好辛苦。
translation: Giving birth is toilsome.

sentence: 生完仔要坐月。
translation: After giving birth, the mother needs to go through postpartum confinement.

sentence: 生仔定生女？

sentence: 对待犯罪分子不能心慈手软。
translation: We should not be softhearted towards criminals.

sentence: 既作为提线木偶在这个矫正教育下生存着，也作为哑剧演员在吃饭照片里生存着。
孩子不学好不成器。
translation: Children who fail to learn from good examples will not grow up to be useful people.

sentence: 好怕怕啊！
translation: So scared right now!

sentence: 今年是什物年呢？今年是猪年乎？
translation: What year is it this year? This year, it's the Year of the Boar, isn't it?

sentence: 王先生出去以后，他的太太吃了一包红头火柴自杀。
translation: After Mr. Wang left, his wife committed suicide by eating a pack of red-tip matches.

sentence: 罢罢，抛妻弃子，也是命中注定，事已如此，也顾他不得了。
6月5日，国家主席习近平在莫斯科克里姆林宫同俄罗斯总统普京会谈。
translation: On June 5th, President Xi Jinping and Russian President Putin held talks at the Kremlin in Moscow.

sentence: 日本帝国主义就利用这个最根本的弱点，大踏步地打了进来。
translation: And the Japanese imperialists have exploited this fundamental weakness to stride into our country.

sentence: 上声与非上声（阴平、阳平、去声）相连，上声调值由214变为半上声21。
translation: When a character to be read with a rising tone is preceded by a character that is not read with a rising tone (dark level tone, light level tone, or departing tone), the rising tone tonal value changes from 214 into a half rising tone tonal value of 21.

sentence: 有够额无？
translation: Is it enough?

sentence: 他使我躺卧在青草地上、领我在可安歇的水边。
translation: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

sentence: 不要老在个人利益的小圈子里打转。
translation: Don't keep going round and round pursuing your own selfish interests.

sentence: 哥们儿，我告诉你，别买这个手机，品控不行，你看网上全是差评。
translation: Bro, [let] me tell you, don't buy this cell phone. [Its] quality control is poor. You look at the web, it's all of [its] negative reviews.

sentence: 真系激死我！
translation: Dang, [it, you, …] piss[es] me off!

sentence: 他一准来吗？
translation: Is he sure to come?

sentence: 今年的收成一准比去年强。
translation: This year's harvest will surely top last year's.

sentence: 一总二十个人。
translation: There are twenty people altogether.

sentence: 我们一总花了三十块钱。
translation: We spent thirty yuan in all.

sentence: 那一总是你的错儿。
translation: It was all your fault.

sentence: 这一阵子尽下雨。
translation: We've had a spell of rainy weather.

sentence: 共产党人一心一德，忠实执行自己的宣言。
translation: We Communists are whole-heartedly and faithfully carrying out our own manifesto.

sentence: 中山革命未完成，共产党人应运生。
translation:
The revolution of Sun Yat-sen left unfinished,
Thus we Communists arose to answer the call.

sentence: 我只要一息尚存，就要努力为党工作。
translation: I'll work hard for the Party as long as I live.

sentence: 你这病要抓紧治，可不能一误再误了。
translation: You should go and see a doctor at once. You mustn't put it off any more.

sentence: 把我们的工作描绘成一团漆黑是完全错误的。
translation: It is completely wrong to describe our work as an utter failure.

sentence: 不论是近百年的和古代的中国史，在许多党员的心目中还是漆黑一团。
translation: Many Party members are still in a fog about Chinese history, whether of the last hundred years or of ancient times.

sentence: 他一时半刻还回不来。
translation: He won't be back for a little while yet.

sentence: 你们都是一事吗？
translation: Are you all together?

sentence: 这两家公司其实是一事。
translation: The two firms are actually one and the same outfit.

sentence: 本来呀，想给您当生日礼物送给您，结果不成想啊，嘿，找不着啦。
小等一下！
translation: Wait a minute!

sentence: 人民所厌恶的国家分裂和混乱的局面，已经一去不复返了。
translation: The days of national disunity and chaos which the people detested are gone, never to return.

sentence: 汽车一溜烟开走了。
translation: The car sped off.

sentence: 他一溜烟就没影儿了。
translation: He disappeared in an instant (a flash).

sentence: 他们常在地里一块儿干活，一来二去地也就熟了。
translation: As they often work together in the fields, they have got to know each other quite well.

sentence: 他就住在那一溜儿。
translation: He lives somewhere around there.

sentence: 他一动就生气。
translation: He takes offence easily.

sentence: 这些成绩是不能一笔抹杀的。
translation: These achievements cannot be gainsaid.

sentence: 这个宪法草案，看样子是得人心的。
translation: This Draft Constitution obviously has popular support.

sentence: 这同用说服教育的方法去解决人民内部的矛盾，是相辅相成的两个方面。
translation: This and the method of persuasion and education complement each other in resolving contradictions among the people.

sentence: 关于「中有」是固态，还是流态的问题，论师们显然观点不一致。
作为观念形态的文艺作品，都是一定的社会生活在人类头脑中的反映的产物。
translation: Works of literature and art, as ideological forms, are products of the reflection in the human brain of the life of a given society.

sentence: 我说我儿子老实巴交的，怎么会离家出走呢！
translation: It now makes sense and I was wondering that how come my son being reserving in behaving would leave his home!

sentence: 婆婆索钱去了，怎生这早晚不见回来？
translation: My mother-in-law went to beg for alms; why am I yet to see her return, despite how late it is?

sentence: 这个软件又自带了一大堆全家桶。
translation: This software brought along a bunch of bundled bloatware again.

sentence: 假托古人之名来着书写文，在古代是很常见的现象。
translation: Writing books and essays under the names of ancients was a very common occurrence in ancient times.

sentence: 赠以越王头，还同月支首，割鲜为饮器，津浆若美酒。
脚巢间仔你不通行。
translation: Don't you visit brothels.

sentence: 我早就把烦恼丢到爪哇国了。
translation: I since the early on have thrown away my sorrow.

sentence: 你们的服务这么差，我凭什么要用真金白银支持你们家啊？
translation: Your services are terrible. Why do I have to use my valuables to support you?

sentence: 我们有缘做朋友吗？
translation: Can we become good friends?

sentence: 事头，请问猪肉几钱斤呀？
translation: Excuse me boss, how much does pork cost per catty?

sentence: 巷子很短，我走不了几分钟就走到另一头，是一条无尾巷。
translation: The alley was very short. It took me just a few minutes to walk to the other side. It was a dead end.

sentence: 插头会电人，应该系漏电了，爱赶紧寻人来检查正好。
translation: The plug makes people get electrocuted, should be a leakage. We need to find someone to check it as soon as possible.

sentence: 对于他们，第一步需要还不是「锦上添花」，而是「雪中送炭」。
translation: For them the prime need is not “more flowers on the brocade” but “fuel in snowy weather”.

sentence: 人民要求普及，跟着也就要求提高，要求逐年逐月地提高。
translation: The people demand popularization and, following that, higher standards; they demand higher standards month by month and year by year.

sentence: 换盏传杯，高谈阔论。
他们三个人围着烟灯谈天，席面上主宾四位，也在那里高谈阔论起来。
他该我几两银子。我要向他取讨。
translation: He owes me a few taels of silver. I have to retrieve them from him.

sentence: 本店是小本生意。
translation: This shop is a small business.

sentence: 空口无凭，立字为证。
translation: Words of mouth being no guarantee, a written statement is hereby given.

sentence: 阿女，食饭喇！
translation: My girl, dinner is ready!

sentence: 你们亏得没让这人掺和儿这事儿，不然啊，这人够你们喝一壶的！
translation: Fortunately you didn't let this person take part in this matter, otherwise, this person would make great troubles to you!

sentence: 一切过程都有始有终，一切过程都转化为它们的对立物。
translation: All processes have a beginning and an end, all processes transform themselves into their opposites.

sentence: 这都是官吏每无心正法，使百姓有口难言。
因为这种议论或批评，没有经过周密调查，不过是无知妄说。
translation: For such views or criticisms, which are not based on thorough investigation, are nothing but ignorant twaddle.

sentence: 科学的发展是无止境的。
translation: The development of science has no limits.

sentence: 大家无拘束地发表意见。
translation: Everyone freely expressed their views.

sentence: 这是自有世界历史和中国历史以来无可比拟的大变化。
translation: This is a tremendous change unparalleled in the history of China and of the world.

sentence: 这些都是无可讳言的事实。
translation: All these are indisputable facts.

sentence: 这事与你无干。
translation: It has nothing to do with you. / It's none of your business.

sentence: 这全是我的过错，跟别人无干。
translation: It was entirely my fault; nobody else had anything to do with it.

sentence: 病人眼见得不行了。
translation: It is clear that the patient won't pull through.

sentence: 孔明曰：「寻章摘句，世之腐儒也，何能兴邦立事。」
translation: Kongming said, “Those pedants who spend all their time selecting phrases to write passages are incompetent when it comes to strengthening their states and accomplishing great deeds.”

sentence: 他们的所谓「不求扩大」的宣传，不过是掩护其进攻的烟幕弹。
translation: Their propaganda that they have "no desire to aggravate the situation" is only a smokescreen for further attacks.

sentence: 倘有不法之徒，胆敢阴谋捣乱，本府本处言出法随，勿谓言之不预。
translation: Henceforward, should any lawless person dare to plot disruption, the Border Region Government and the Rear Headquarters will enforce these regulations to the letter and will accept no plea of ignorance.

sentence: 我们现在虽有中华民国之名，尚无中华民国之实，循名责实，这就是今天的工作。
translation: Today we have a Republic of China in name but not in reality, and our present task is to create the reality that will fit the name.

sentence: 等一下！你等我创了。
translation: Wait a moment! Wait for me to finish doing it.

sentence: 你这是对谁甩闲话呢？
translation: Who are you complaining about?

sentence: 小标题一律居中。
translation: Subheads should be placed in the middle of the column. / Center the subheads.

sentence: 真罕行，你今仔日哪有闲通来？
translation: Long time no see, how did you manage to find time to come today?

sentence: 我真是天字第一号的大笨蛋！
translation: I really am the biggest idiot on Earth!

sentence: 若遇此等人，敬而远之，以免杀身之祸。
那知轻举妄动，却有杀身之祸！
不就是你知道，不告送我吗？
不是人像沙枣，是沙枣像人。
translation: It's not that humans are like oleasters, but that oleasters are like humans.

sentence: 我们在向农民供应工业品方面，采取薄利多销、稳定物价或适当降价的政策。
translation: In supplying the peasants with manufactured goods we follow a policy of larger sales at a small profit and of stabilizing or appropriately reducing their prices.

sentence: 拒绝「落地成盒」！这些装备助你成功吃「鸡」
translation: Reject "landing to become a box"! This setup will help you win your "chicken dinner"

sentence: 我每一局不是落地成盒，就是被秒杀，气得砸手机的想法都有。
translation: In every match, if I'm not "landing to become a box", I'm being seckilled, and it pisses me off to the point that sometimes I've considered smashing my phone.

sentence: 客家人和原住民是国民党的铁票。
translation: Hakka people and indigenous people are safe votes for the Kuomintang.

sentence: 新来的同工必须要有清楚的指示，特别是关于教会对他的期待。
translation: A new staff minister needs to be instructed specifically as to what will be expected of him.

sentence: 阿仔，做晒功课未呀？
translation: Son, have you finished your homework?

sentence: 把二者混为一谈，无疑是很不适当的。
translation: It is undoubtedly inappropriate to mix the two up.

sentence: 这个成果还挺不赖。
translation: This result is pretty good.

sentence: 别看你今天闹得欢，小心今后拉清单，这都得应验的。
translation: Don't think that you can be as crazy as today. Be careful that you will got even in the future. You'll reap what you sow.

sentence: 同志们，真正的铜墙铁壁是什么？是群众，是千百万真心实意地拥护革命的群众。
translation: Comrades! What is a true bastion of iron? It is the masses, the millions upon millions of people who genuinely and sincerely support the revolution.

sentence: 中国降了，任何人都要做亡国奴。
translation: Had China capitulated, every Chinese would have become a slave without a country.

sentence: 中国人民为国家独立、民族解放和民主自由进行了前仆后继的英勇奋斗。
translation: The Chinese people, wave upon wave, waged heroic struggles for national independence and liberation and for democracy and freedom.

sentence: 我常想在纷扰中寻出一点闲静来，然而委实不容易。
translation: I often hanker after a little peace and respite from confusion, but it is really hard to come by.

sentence: 三角眼，口耳眼鼻五官都小，头部却很大，穿国中制服，球鞋，没有穿袜子。
translation: [He had] uncanny eyes, with mouth, ears, eyes, nose these facial features all rather small, but with a rather large head. [He] wore a middle school uniform and athletic shoes, and didn't wear socks.

sentence: 大家原本只是怀疑他而已，但他忙于辩解的样子反而是欲盖弥彰，不打自招。
translation: Everyone was just suspecting him in the beginning, but the way he was explaining himself only made his actions more like incriminating himself.

sentence: 与其欲盖弥彰，倒不如自己先认了。
translation: Rather than to covering up the truth, it's better to admit it by yourself.

sentence: 前我失丧，今被寻回，瞎眼今得看见。
translation: I once was lost, but now am found, Was blind, but now I see.

sentence: 到了旅游旺季，各大景点都人满为患。
translation: During peak seasons for tourism, every site is packed with people.

sentence: 人大概是没有不犯错误的，多多少少要犯错误，犯了错误就要帮助。
translation: Probably no one is free from mistakes, only some make more and some less, and once they do they need help.

sentence: 文艺界的主要的斗争方法之一，是文艺批评。
translation: Literary and art criticism is one of the principal methods of struggle in the world of literature and art.

sentence: 现在有些不满于文学批评的，总说近几年的所谓批评，不外乎捧与骂。
translation: Nowadays, some unsatisfied with literary criticism say that the so-called criticism in recent years is nothing more than flattery and scolding.

sentence: 不认识这一点，把无产阶级的政治和政治家庸俗化，是不对的。
translation: It would be wrong to fail to realize this and to debase the politics and the statespeople of the proletariat.

sentence: 要严厉反对少数人干的关门主义，命令主义的错误办法。
translation: We should strictly combat the mistaken method of closed doorism and commandism followed by a minority.

sentence: 原文文字有手民之误，作「南海来岛」，现更正为「南海各岛」。
他办事很把稳。
translation: He is dependable in what he does.

sentence: 到了革命根据地，就是到了中国历史几千年来空前未有的人民大众当权的时代。
translation: To come to the revolutionary bases means to enter an epoch unprecedented in the thousands of years of Chinese history, an epoch in which the masses of the people wield state power.

sentence: 后世无高学，举俗爱许浑。
translation: In later generations there is no intellectual; the common folk all admire Xu Hun.”

sentence: 弱弱地问一句……
translation: Please excuse me for asking the following which is super-stupid: […]

sentence: 那长老自服了草还丹，真是脱胎换骨，神爽体健。
落闸放狗！
translation: Shut down the gates and let the dogs to guard the shop!

sentence: 昨儿我看见人家一本春宫儿，画的很好，上头还有许多的字。
translation: Yesterday I saw someone's erotic drawing, which was well-drawn and had a lot of characters on it.

sentence: 他们在开始阶段只是身历了许多作战的经验，而且败仗是打得很多的。
translation: At the initial stage they will merely experience a good deal of fighting and, what is more, suffer many defeats.

sentence: 战争问题中的唯心论和机械论的倾向，是一切错误观点的认识论上的根源。
translation: Epistemologically speaking, the source of all erroneous views on war lies in idealist and mechanistic tendencies on the question.

sentence: 他们两个说的是一回事。
translation: Those two people said the same thing.

sentence: 说的是一回事，做的又是一回事。
translation: Saying is one thing; doing is another.

sentence: 别不把它当做一回事！
translation: Don't treat it lightly!

sentence: 求你沛然降临，求你充满我心，让我存谦卑的心，天天与你同行。
translation: May you come down abundantly, may you fill my heart, so that I may have a humble heart and walk with you daily.

sentence: 一个闭目塞听、同客观外界根本绝缘的人，是无所谓认识的。
translation: For a person who shuts their eyes, stops their ears and totally cuts themselves off from the objective world there can be no such thing as knowledge.

sentence: 就不登录怎么地了？
translation: What are you going to do if I just don't log in?

sentence: 他今天没上班是怎么地了？
translation: How come he didn't come to work today?

sentence: 怎么地，你想找他做老公吗？
translation: What, you want to make him your husband?

sentence: 我倒想看看你们能把我怎么地了。
translation: I'm actually looking forward to seeing what you can do to me.

sentence: 看他晕了，我们当时就蒙了，就不知道怎么地了。
translation: Seeing that he fainted, we were so shocked and were at a loss what to do.

sentence: 再牛也不敢把他怎么地。
translation: They wouldn't dare lay a finger on him however tough they were.

sentence: 这俩人，还没怎么地呢，就掰了。
translation: Those two people broke up before they even started seriously dating.

sentence: 高尔夫怎么地也是一项洋气的运动。
translation: Golf is a high-class sport regardless.

sentence: 你以为你能想怎么地就怎么地啊。
translation: You think you can do whatever you want here?

sentence: 不要一张嘴就你们城里人怎么怎么地了。
translation: Don't speak like every sentence coming out of your mouth is about how you think city-dwellers are superior [lit. are such and such].

sentence: 现在这水平，再怎么地，哪天去了国外，日常生活还是能应付的。
translation: As bad as it seems, my foreign language level would still be enough for daily conversations if I ever go abroad.

sentence: 她长得不错，但是性格却不怎么地。
translation: She is quite good-looking, but her personality is not so flattering.

sentence: 无数相对真理的总和，就是绝对真理。
translation: The sum total of innumerable relative truths constitutes absolute truth.

sentence: 党有几十万党员，他们在领导人民，向着敌人作艰苦卓绝的斗争。
translation: The Party has several hundred thousand members who are leading the people in extremely hard and bitter struggles against the enemy.

sentence: 然而曾某却偏要日以吹拍为事，日以造谣中伤为事。
translation: However, Zeng insisted on engaging in flattery on one day and defamation on the other.

sentence: 你完完全全调查明白了，你对那个问题就有解决的办法了。
translation: When you have investigated the problem thoroughly, you will know how to solve it.

sentence: 我们调查所要得到的结论，是各阶级现在的以及历史的盛衰荣辱的情况。
translation: The outcome of our investigation should be a picture of the present situation of each class and the ups and downs of its development.

sentence: 今后他走他的阳关道，我走我的独木桥，老死不相往来。
translation: From now on, he goes his way and I'll go mine. We will be two parallel worlds.

sentence: 今日果不其然！如今拿了银子家去骂这死砍头短命的奴才！
事物的矛盾法则，即对立统一的法则，是唯物辩证法的最根本的法则。
translation: The law of contradiction in things, that is, the law of the unity of opposites, is the basic law of materialist dialectics.

sentence: 马克思主义的哲学认为，对立统一规律是宇宙的根本规律。
translation: Marxist philosophy holds that the law of the unity of opposites is the fundamental law of the universe.

sentence: 他们不了解矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。
translation: They do not understand that it is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.

sentence: 这是共通的道理，古今中外，概莫能外。
translation: This is a universal truth for all times and all countries, which admits of no exception.

sentence: 生财有道，受用无由。
translation:
[They] are expert in making money,
[But they] can't enjoy [their] money.

sentence: 军队、警察、法庭等项国家机器，是阶级压迫阶级的工具。
translation: The state apparatus, including the army, the police and the courts, is the instrument by which one class oppresses another.

sentence: 矛盾着的对立面又统一，又斗争，由此推动事物的运动和变化。
translation: Between the opposites in a contradiction there is at once unity and struggle, and it is this that impels things to move and change.

sentence: 我们的方针是：「有反必肃，有错必纠」。
translation: Our policy is: "Counter-revolutionaries must be eliminated wherever found, mistakes must be corrected whenever discovered."

sentence: 合作化完成了，这就解决了我国社会主义工业化同个体农业经济之间的大矛盾。
translation: The co-operative transformation [of agriculture] has been successfully accomplished, and this has resolved the great contradiction in our country between socialist industrialization and the individual peasant economy.

sentence: 这个合作社所在的地方是一个山地，历来很穷，年年靠人民政府运粮去救济。
translation: This co-operative is situated in a hilly region which was very poor in the past and which for a number of years depended on relief grain from the People's Government.

sentence: 一九五三年开始办社的时候，人们把它叫做「穷棒子社」。
translation: When the co-operative was first set up in 1953, people called it the "paupers' co-op".

sentence: 在资产阶级民主革命时期，它有革命性的一面，又有妥协性的一面。
translation: In the period of the bourgeois-democratic revolution, [the Chinese national bourgeoisie] had both a revolutionary and a conciliationist side to its character.

sentence: 今年要求在全国各方面提倡节约，反对浪费。
translation: This year we are calling for economy and the elimination of waste in every sphere throughout the country.

sentence: 共产党同各民主党派长期共存，这是我们的愿望，也是我们的方针。
translation: It is our desire as well as our policy to exist side by side with the democratic parties for a long time to come.

sentence: 各党派互相监督的事实，也早已存在，就是各党派互相提意见，作批评。
translation: Mutual supervision among the various parties is also a long-established fact, in the sense that they have long been advising and criticizing each other.

sentence: 事实上，唯心主义者不是每天都在用各种形式批评马克思主义吗？
translation: In fact, aren't the idealists criticizing Marxism every day and in every way?

sentence: 无聊！我要看到血流成河！
translation: Boring! I want to see some body parts!

sentence: 在这个广大的领土之上，有广大的肥田沃地，给我们以衣食之源。
translation: In this vast country of ours there are large areas of fertile land which provide us with food and clothing.

sentence: 割地之外，又索去了巨大的赔款。
translation: In addition to annexing territory, they exacted huge indemnities.

sentence: 这些矛盾的斗争及其尖锐化，就不能不造成日益发展的革命运动。
translation: These contradictions and their intensification must inevitably result in the incessant growth of revolutionary movements.

sentence: 在这样的敌人面前，中国革命的长期性和残酷性就发生了。
translation: In the face of such enemies, the Chinese revolution cannot be other than protracted and ruthless.

sentence: 君子之儒，忠君爱国，守正恶邪，务使泽及当时，名留后世。
translation: A True scholar is loyal to his sovereign and loves his country, abiding by the right and hating evil, eager to benefit the men of his time and leave a good name to posterity.

sentence: 霍以常认真地说：「我主张，全部敲沙罐。」
translation: Yichang Huo said seriously, "I advocate for all of them to be shot dead."

sentence: 木雕题材广泛，人物、山水、花卉、鸟兽、博古等应有尽有。
translation: The themes of wood carving are diverse, such as figures, landscapes, flora, fauna, and antiquities.

sentence: 心怀二意的人为我所恨，但你的律法为我所爱。
translation: I hate double-minded people, but I love your law.

sentence: 有空阿拉屋里白相来。
translation: Come over to our home to play when you have time.

sentence: 地铁站离我屋里老近个。
translation: The metro station is very close to my home.

sentence: 阿拉屋里有三个人。
translation: My family has four people.

sentence: 我们对于大资产阶级投降派的政策是把他们当作敌人看待，坚决地打倒他们。
translation: Our policy towards the big bourgeois capitulationists is to treat them as enemies and resolutely strike them down.

sentence: 民族资产阶级是带两重性的阶级。
translation: The national bourgeoisie is a class with a dual character.

sentence: 这种三民主义即是孙中山的三大政策，即联俄、联共和扶助农工政策的三民主义。
translation: These Three People's Principles embody Dr. Sun Yat-sen's Three Great Policies—alliance with Russia, co-operation with the Communist Party and assistance to the peasants and workers.

sentence: 过去我们就是鉴于他们的经验教训，少走了一些弯路，现在当然更要引以为戒。
translation: It was by drawing lessons from their experience that we were able to avoid certain detours in the past, and there is all the more reason for us to do so now.

sentence: 他是主管，说话怎能不作准？
translation: He is the boss, how can his words not matter?

sentence: 工农业品的交换，我们是采取缩小剪刀差，等价交换或者近乎等价交换的政策。
translation: In the exchange of industrial and agricultural products we follow a policy of narrowing the price scissors, a policy of exchanging equal or roughly equal values.

sentence: 处理好中央和地方的关系，这对于我们这样的大国大党是一个十分重要的问题。
translation: For a large country like ours and a big Party like ours the proper handling of the relationship between the central and local authorities is of vital importance.

sentence: 我们的宪法规定，立法权集中在中央。
translation: According to our Constitution, the legislative powers are all vested in the central authorities.

sentence: 密率，圆径一百一十三，圆周三百五十五。约率，圆径七，周二十二。
translation: The minute ratio: diameter 113, circumference 355. The simple ratio: diameter 7, circumference 22.

sentence: 社会上的反革命因为是老百姓的直接冤头，老百姓恨透了，所以少数人还是要杀。
translation: Counter-revolutionaries in society are the mortal and immediate enemies of the people and are deeply hated by them, and therefore a small number should be executed.

sentence: 倒是没有犯过错误的人容易犯错误，因为他容易把尾巴翘得高。
translation: On the other hand, since it is easier for those who have not erred to become cocky, they are prone to make mistakes.

sentence: 但是，必须有分析有批判地学，不能盲目地学，不能一切照抄，机械搬用。
translation: But we must learn with an analytical and critical eye, not blindly, and we mustn't copy everything indiscriminately and transplant mechanically.

sentence: 正是：替天行道人将至，仗义疏财汉便来。
translation: Indeed: The man to enforce the Way on behalf of Heaven is coming; the gallant to finance the upholding of justice will arrive soon.

sentence: 不可以色色！
translation: No horny! (Internet meme)

sentence: 有三个人没有饭吃，乡政府和互济会就马上捐米救济他们。
translation: In another instance, three persons were starving, so the township government and the mutual-aid society immediately gave them rice.

sentence: 去年夏荒，乡政府从二百多里的公略县办了米来救济群众。
translation: During the food shortage last summer, the township government obtained rice from Kunglueh County, more than two hundred li away, for the relief of the masses.

sentence: 要使广大群众认识我们是代表他们的利益的，是和他们呼吸相通的。
translation: We should convince the masses that we represent their interests, that our lives are intimately bound up with theirs.

sentence: 一切这些群众生活上的问题，都应该把它提到自己的议事日程上。
translation: All such problems concerning the well-being of the masses should be placed on our agenda.

sentence: 时候已经过了午夜。全个城市静静地睡去了。
translation: It was past midnight, and the whole city slept quietly.

sentence: 若不听从，就要被刀杀灭，无知无识而死。
translation: But if they do not listen, they will perish by the sword and die without knowledge.

sentence: 对象都不是无知无识的愚民，他们多少也懂得一点，他们对我的谈话很有兴趣。
translation: The people I have talked to are by no means ignoramuses; they all have some understanding of what is going on and are very interested in what I have to say.

sentence: 例如妥协的空气时起时伏，主张妥协者的根据就是「再战必亡」。
translation: For instance, from time to time an atmosphere of compromise arises and the advocates of compromise argue that "the continuance of the war spells subjugation".

sentence: 我们胜了，日阀就在精神上失了立场，只有静候末日审判。
translation: If we win, the Japanese warlords will be demoralized and able only to await their Day of Judgement.

sentence: 这就是所谓日本战争的退步性。
translation: This is what we mean by the retrogressive nature of Japan's war.

sentence: 日本战争的退步性和野蛮性是日本战争必然失败的主要根据。
translation: The reactionary and barbarous character of Japan's war constitutes the primary reason for her inevitable defeat.

sentence: 这个特点的具体反映是日本的退步和寡助，中国的进步和多助。
translation: These characteristics are concretely reflected in Japan's retrogression and paucity of support and in China's progress and abundance of support.

sentence: 我发现我最近只要一心情难过，家长就开始发我小时候照片，性别焦虑拉满了。
translation: I found out that recently, whenever I got sad, my parents would send me photos of me in my childhood, which triggered my gender dysphoria.

sentence: 今天的世界的人民运动，正在以空前的大规模和空前的深刻性发展着。
translation: The popular movements in the world today are developing on a scale and with a depth that are unprecedented.

sentence: 我们依然是一个弱国，我们在军力、经济力和政治组织力各方面都显得不如敌人。
translation: We are still a weak country and manifestly inferior to the enemy in military, economic and political-organizational power.

sentence: 中国是如日方升的国家，这同日本帝国主义的没落状态恰是相反的对照。
translation: By contrast with Japanese imperialism, which is declining, China is a country rising like the morning sun.

sentence: 在太阳旗下，每个中国人只能当顺民，做牛马，不许有一丝一毫的中国气。
translation: Under the flag of the "Rising Sun" all Chinese are forced to be docile subjects, beasts of burden forbidden to show the slightest trace of Chinese national spirit.

sentence: 空前强大的社会主义的苏联，它和中国是历来休戚相关的。
translation: The socialist Soviet Union, now strong as never before, has always shared China's joys and sorrows.

sentence: 他笔底下来得快。
translation: He is a facile writer.

sentence: 而且对于中国现在看惯了斜眼削肩的美女图的眼睛，也是很有澄清的益处的。
由于全体演员的努力，最精彩的结幕便能很好地演出来。
translation: And through the efforts of the entire cast it will become possible to perform a most brilliant last act.

sentence: 这样看来，战争的长期性和随之而来的残酷性，是明显的。
translation: It is thus obvious that the war is protracted and consequently ruthless in nature.

sentence: 总合这些力量就能形成中国的优势，完成反攻的准备。
translation: It is the combination of all these forces that will bring about China's superiority and the completion of her preparations for the counter-offensive.

sentence: 兵民是胜利之本。
translation: The army and the people are the foundation of victory.

sentence: 这组织，就是军队及其附随的一切东西。
translation: The organizations are the armed forces and everything that goes with them.

sentence: 偏远地区听不到炮声的人们，至今还是静悄悄地在那里过活。
translation: Even now the people in the remoter regions beyond the noise of the guns are carrying on quietly as usual.

sentence: 中国还有一部分知识分子和其它人等存有糊涂思想，对美国存有幻想。
translation: There are still some intellectuals and other people in China who have muddled ideas and illusions about the United States.

sentence: 他脸孔高头有几点麻子儿。
translation: There are several pockmucks on his face.

sentence: 动员了全国的老百姓，就造成了陷敌于灭顶之灾的汪洋大海。
translation: The mobilization of the common people throughout the country will create a vast sea in which to drown the enemy.

sentence: 因为前者，于是利用地形地物，采取跃进运动，疏开队形，种种方法都发生了。
translation: The former gives rise to such techniques as making use of the terrain and its features, advancing in spurts, and spreading out in dispersed formation.

sentence: 因为后者，于是扫清射界，组织火网，种种方法也发生了。
translation: The latter gives rise to other techniques, such as clearing the field of fire and organizing a fire-net.

sentence: 为了实行速决，一般应不打驻止中之敌，而打运动中之敌。
translation: In general, to achieve quick decision, we should attack a moving and not a stationary enemy.

sentence: 就能大大地沮丧敌人的精神，振起我军的士气，号召世界的声援。
translation: It would greatly demoralize the enemy, stimulate the morale of our own forces and evoke international support.

sentence: 我是速决，敌虽企图持久待援，但不能由他作主。
translation: And we shall seek quick decisions, while the enemy, try as he may, will not be able to protract the fighting in the expectation of reinforcements.

sentence: 要做到这些，先决条件是优越的民众组织。
translation: Excellent organization of the masses is the prerequisite for attaining all this.

sentence: 敌之在台儿庄失败和山西困处，就是显证。
translation: The enemy's defeat at Tai'erzhuang and his predicament in Shanxi prove this clearly.

sentence: 我在敌后游击战争的广大发展，则使其占领地的守军完全处于被动地位。
translation: The widespread development of guerrilla warfare in the enemy's rear has placed his garrisons in the occupied areas in a completely passive position.

sentence: 将敌军对我军的战略上的分进合击，改为我军对敌军的战役或战斗上的分进合击。
translation: We can change the converging attack directed by the enemy against us on the plane of strategy into converging attacks directed by us against the enemy on the plane of campaigns and battles.

sentence: 我们是持久论和最后胜利论者，不是赌汉们那样的孤注一掷论者。
translation: We are for protracted war and final victory, we are not gamblers who risk everything on a single throw.

sentence: 战争的伟力之最深厚的根源，存在于民众之中。
translation: The richest source of power to wage war lies in the masses of the people.

sentence: 那些希望日本资产阶级中和派出来停止战争的，仅仅是一种幻想而已。
translation: Those who hope that the moderates among the Japanese bourgeoisie will come forward and stop the war are only harbouring illusions.

sentence: 岂有如此广土众民的国家而患财穷之理？
translation: Why should a country as large and populous [as China] suffer from lack of funds?

sentence: 文革殷鉴不远。
translation: The Cultural Revolution is not far past.

sentence: 你们的纸片人老婆也要被拳师毁掉了，颤抖吧，直男们！
translation: Your 2d waifus are going to be destroyed by radical feminists too. Tremble, straight men!

sentence: 这本书深奥难懂，对我而言简直是无字天书。
禁止套娃。
translation: Recursion is forbidden.

sentence: 连日暴雨令这个镇变成泽国。
translation: The prolonged rainstorm has completely flooded this town.

sentence: 谁人不知，两个拳师放对，聪明的拳师往往退让一步。
translation: We all know that when two boxers fight, the clever boxer usually gives a little ground at first.

sentence: 最大的和最残酷的非正义的反革命的战争，迫临在我们的头上。
translation: The biggest and most ruthless of unjust counter-revolutionary wars is hanging over us.

sentence: 我们应该学习它，具体地说，学北伐战争的长驱直进和夺取大城市。
translation: We must learn from it, or, to put it more concretely, we must imitate the Northern Expedition in driving straight ahead to seize the big cities.

sentence: 这件事情已经不是什么秘密，敌人一般地都摸熟我们的脾气了。
translation: That is no longer a secret, and in general the enemy is by now well acquainted with our way.

sentence: 鲁莽家不知改变，或不愿改变，只是一味盲干，结果又非碰壁不可。
translation: A rash person who does not understand the need for such alterations or is unwilling to make them, but who acts blindly, will inevitably run their head against a brick wall.

sentence: 自耕农和手工业主所经营的，都是小生产的经济。
translation: The owner-peasants and the master handicraftspeople are both engaged in small-scale production.

sentence: 我们的政权是分散而又孤立的山地或僻地的政权，没有任何的外间援助。
translation: Our political power exists in scattered and isolated mountainous or remote regions and receives no outside help whatsoever.

sentence: 根据地虽小却有很大的政治上的威力，屹然和庞大的国民党政权相对立。
translation: Our base areas, small as they are, are politically very powerful and stand firmly opposed to the enormous Kuomintang regime.

sentence: 消极防御，又叫专守防御，又叫单纯防御。
translation: Passive defence is also known as purely defensive defence or pure defence.

sentence: 中国战史中合此原则而取胜的实例是非常之多的。
translation: China's military history contains numerous instances of victories won on these principles.

sentence: 假如这样，又假如突围后的领导稍为聪明一点，情况便将有很大的不同。
translation: If that had been done, and if the leadership had been a little wiser after our breakthrough, the outcome would have been very different.

sentence: 对于几乎一切都取给于敌方的红军，基本的方针是歼灭战。
translation: For the Red Army which gets almost all its supplies from the enemy, war of annihilation is the basic policy.

sentence: 你并非孤军作战。
translation: You are not alone.

sentence: 可以说我们已经脱离了过去的那种慢慢发展的孤军作战的景况。
translation: It can be said that we have outgrown the past state of slow development and fighting in isolation.

sentence: 红军虽弱，却养精蓄锐，以逸待劳。
translation: But the Red Army, though weak, has conserved its strength and stored up its energy, and is waiting at its ease [for the fatigued enemy].

sentence: 我们只有使自己操练得高人一等，才有战略胜利的可能。
translation: Only when we have trained ourselves to be a head taller than the enemy will strategic victories be possible.

sentence: 人人皆知以多胜少是最好的办法，然而很多人不能做，相反地每每分散兵力。
translation: Everybody knows that the best way is to use a large force to defeat a small one, and yet many people fail to do so and on the contrary often divide their forces up.

sentence: 有时退到该地区还无隙可乘，便不得不再退几步，待敌发生可乘之「隙」。
translation: Sometimes when we have retreated to the predetermined area and not yet found openings to exploit, we have to retreat farther and wait for the enemy to give us an opening.

sentence: 实在是一种鲁莽灭裂的干法。
translation: This was really rash and foolhardy conduct.

sentence: 并且不放弃土地又能打胜敌人不是更好些吗？
translation: Moreover, was it not better to defeat the enemy without abandoning territory?

sentence: 都是双方强弱不同，弱者先让一步，后发制人，因而战胜的。
translation: In each case the contending sides were unequal, and the weaker side, yielding some ground at first, gained mastery by striking only after the enemy had struck and so defeated the stronger side.

sentence: 心目中没有集体生活的原则，只有自由放任。
translation: To show no regard at all for the principles of collective life but to follow one's own inclination.

sentence: 自以为对革命有功，摆老资格，大事做不来，小事又不做，工作随便，学习松懈。
translation: To regard oneself as having rendered great service to the revolution, to pride oneself on being a veteran, to disdain minor assignments while being quite unequal to major tasks, to be slipshod in work and slack in study.

sentence: 大家以为有了出路，愁眉锁眼的姿态为之一扫。
translation: There is a general feeling that a way out of the impasse has been found, and people no longer knit their brows in despair.

sentence: 对于全国先进的文化工作者，我们的东西，只当作引玉之砖，千虑之一得。
translation: Our observations may contain a grain of truth for the nation's advanced cultural workers and may serve as a modest spur to induce them to come forward with valuable contributions of their own.

sentence: 大敌当前，他们要联合工农反对敌人；工农觉悟，他们又联合敌人反对工农。
translation: When confronted by a formidable enemy, they united with the workers and peasants against the enemy, but when the workers and peasants awakened, they turned round to unite with the enemy against the workers and peasants.

sentence: 再不变计，民族的命运是非常危险的。
translation: If we don't change our plan, our national future will be gravely imperilled.

sentence: 扫除农村中的封建关系，把土地变为农民的私产。
translation: Abolish feudal relations in the rural areas, and turn the land over to the private ownership of the peasants.

sentence: 但是他们做贼心虚，怕共产党阻挡他们的去路，更怕老百姓骂汉奸。
translation: But, with the cowardice of thieves, they fear that the Communists will block their exit and, what is more, that the common people will brand them as traitors.

sentence: 于是打伙儿地开了个会，决议：事先要在文化界舆论界准备一下。
translation: So they have put their heads together and decided to prepare the ground in cultural circles and through the press.

sentence: 后儒牵强附会，费尽心思，不知都是古今学不分明的缘故。
其声势之浩大，威力之猛烈，简直是所向无敌的。
translation: Its influence has been so great and its impact so powerful that it is invincible wherever it goes.

sentence: 至于盟长资格，就不得不落在无产阶级文化思想的肩上。
translation: Inevitably the responsibility for leading the alliance rested on proletarian culture and ideology.

sentence: 这就增加了共产党批评同盟者、揭破假革命、争取领导权的责任。
translation: This increases the responsibility devolving on the Communist Party to criticize its allies, unmask the fake revolutionaries, and gain the leadership.

sentence: 谁怀疑我们领导革命战争的能力，谁就会陷进机会主义的泥坑里去。
translation: Whoever questions our ability to lead the revolutionary war will fall into the morass of opportunism.

sentence: 这个叫做不会择敌和浪费弹药。

sentence: 马克思列宁主义反对革命队伍中的幼稚病。

sentence: 关门主义在实际上是日本帝国主义和汉奸卖国贼的忠顺的奴仆。

sentence: 共产党人现在已经不是小孩子了，他们能够善处自己，又能够善处同盟者。

sentence: 希特勒被消灭以后，打败日本侵略者就为时不远了。

sentence: 但是，中国共产党和中国人民并没有被吓倒，被征服，被杀绝。

sentence: 在中国解放区，敌人的摧残是异常严重的；水、旱、虫灾，也时常发生。

sentence: 截止中午十二时，本港共有106宗武汉肺炎怀疑个案。

sentence: 一口接一口地享受这「三味一体」的火鸭鸡，真是感恩大餐中最难忘的滋味。

sentence: 不要煮特大啃啦，虽然这三鸟中我只不爱火鸡，可是也没必要吃那么多肉吧？

sentence: 二姑娘搬出去的好快，你瞧瞧这地方好空落落的。

sentence: 女子嘲笑乞丐衣服破烂，怎料他竟是百万富翁。

sentence: 小偷丢下钱包撒腿就跑。

sentence: 江神父于二零一九年在香港安息主怀。

sentence: 老而不死食了米。

sentence: 大妈地几多钱斤呀？

sentence: 我还当仔伊真个答应我，原来是拨我吃一只空心汤团？

sentence: 长江后浪推前浪，一代新人换旧人。

sentence: 其一忠厚老实，做事四直。

sentence: 顺利的生产有时还不免危险，稍有危难的证候便是有百死而无一生。

sentence: 我属小龙。

sentence: 四渡赤水，是毛泽东军事生涯中的神来之笔。

sentence: 尽管轴心国早已被击败，但法西斯主义思想仍然在极右翼分子的心中阴魂不散。

sentence: 撒母耳下其中，大卫的生平事迹有大起也有大落。

sentence: 出约卖地，那是有年无日的事，弟是万万不能等的。
于是就有荒凉枯寂的坟墓，灰败无光的白骨，历历呈现在自己的幻想里。
translation: The desolate and silent graves, the bleak and lifeless bones, vividly appeared within one's imagination.

sentence: 冬十月、禁天下学花郎道。

sentence: 阿花？你麻甩仔一个点解会叫阿花？

sentence: 麻甩仔，飞天高；跌落地，甩条毛。

sentence: 这便是遏绝天理，失其初心也。

sentence: 即便在今天，许多社群媒体用户仍会用诸如「口罩时期」之类的代号来规避审查。

sentence: 我怕在那里久惹是非，所以就告假出了京来。

sentence: 爬起来吧，你会把你的裤子弄脏的。

sentence: 如此小娘子，该配此才郎！况且年貌相等，门阀相当。

sentence: 这个人造岛的名字叫「波西多」，是希猎神话中海神的名字。

sentence: 这不就是小粉红大战小粉绿的平台吗？

sentence: 让这部作品足够称为粪作资格的，不是其他东西，而是剧本。

sentence: 牛魔不怕施威猛，铁棍高擎有见机。翻云覆雨随来往，吐雾喷风任发挥。

sentence: 共有350万推友参加了马斯克发起的问卷调查。

sentence: 竖笛堵水了。

sentence: 他因为欠债不还被列入了限高名单。

sentence: 健，你看，你看……这里乱过乱葬岗呀！连鬼都不愿住啦！

sentence: 在那个风云际会的年代，不少有志青年都渴望建功立业。

sentence: 好多人话，文科系乞食科，无错，系香港读文科，真系同乞食无分别。

sentence: 这位记者突然连珠炮似的发起问来。

sentence: 队旗在战场上具有重要的识别作用。
